text: oh iwe Mtumwi! Alimbikitse anthu okhulupirira kuti amenye nkhondo. Ngati pali anthu makumi awiri opilira pakati panu, iwo adzagonjetsa anthu mazana awiri; ndipo ngati pali anthu zana limodzi, iwo adzagonjetsa anthu chikwi chimodzi cha anthu osakhulupirira chifukwa iwo ndi anthu amene sazindikira
